reviews.review_msg: Love him!! He's such a great prof! He's super funny too. Exams and assignments were pretty fair. I would definitely take another class with him.

I found him to be very nice, he cares about his students. He has a good sense of humour and is easygoing, and he gets excited when he talks! He cares about his subject. Sometimes a little repetitive, and the course has A LOT of readings
